banner_title: Learning Math Has Never Been So Fun
banner_subtitle: A friendly and accessible platform that guides you step by step.
intro_title: AN INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE TO LEARN BY PLAYING
intro_text: Strengthen your knowledge with activities designed for elementary school students. WebClass offers tutorials, challenges, games, videos, and simulations to reinforce your math skills at home or school.
juegos_texto: Learn math by solving fun challenges.
videos_texto: Watch clear explanations with engaging animations.
retos_texto: Complete weekly challenges and unlock medals.
consultas_texto: Send your questions and get help clearly and quickly.
explora_texto: Access fun content about addition, subtraction, multiplication, and more.
aprende_texto: Enjoy level-adapted activities to strengthen your learning step by step.
cta_texto: Would you like to use WebClass in your classes? Leave your contact and we'll send you a personalized proposal.
info_texto: WebClass lets you learn math in a fun way. Access games, videos, challenges and send questions from anywhere. You just need an account or enter as a guest.
login_mensaje: Log in to start your math adventure.
bienvenida_subtitulo: Choose the resource you'd like to use today:
bienvenida_videos_texto: Explore animations that explain math in a fun way.
bienvenida_juegos_texto: Solve math challenges with fun games.
bienvenida_practicas_texto: Graded exercises to strengthen your learning.
bienvenida_simulacros_texto: Test your knowledge with real-like exams.
texto_videos: Explore videos that explain math topics visually and simply.
texto_juegos: Learn while playing with challenges designed to reinforce your math skills.
texto_praticas: Test your knowledge with graded and progressive exercises.
texto_simulacros: Take a realistic quiz and track your math progress.
video1_desc: Explore basic addition operations for children.
video2_desc: Addition and subtraction with fruit and fun characters.
video3_desc: Travel by counting numbers from 1 to 10 with music.
video4_desc: Learn to count to 20 with fun songs.
descripcion_perfil: View and update your personal information.
contactanos_sub: We would love to hear your feedback about our platform. Your suggestions help us provide a better service. If you would like more information or are interested in using WebClass, feel free to contact us.
modal_contacto_texto: Weâ€™ve received your message and will get back to you shortly.
